hanzi-su-wiki:
験

Значения

Испытывать, проверять; действие, эффект

Мнемоника

  • Сокращение. Выводить коня 馬 на люди и совместно учинять ему полную проверку. Справа — человек 人, рот 口, а также треугольник — символ единства в значении собираться вместе и горланить, «сообща».

  • Прежде чем подняться на гору, человек проверяет лошадь 馬.

Варианты

驗, 验
purpleculture_pinyin:
yàn
Japanese variant of 验
Японский вариант теста

heisig_constituent: verification, team of horses, awl, fit, meeting, umbrella, mouth, person
koohiiStory1: We just verification that there are indeed no soldiers in the belly of this trojan horse. We´re just gonna stab it in the belly with this awl to check.
koohiiStory2: The verification proves the horse is real by poking it with an ice pick.
kunYomi: あかし、しるし、ため.す、ためし
jp_example_words:
体験(たいけん): personal experience
実験(じっけん): experiment
受験(じゅけん): taking an examination
経験(けいけん): experience
試験(しけん): examination
jp_readingExamples: 試験 (しけん), 経験 (けいけん), 実験 (じっけん)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: "A horse or a squid?" That's the only question that is on your test.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info:
This test is the most important test of your life, which is why it's confusing that there is only this one question: "horse or squid?"
If you choose "horse" jump to reading mnemonic "A."
If you choose "squid" jump to reading mnemonic "B."
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic:
A. On the test, you fill in the "horse" bubble. Immediately after, Ken (けん) the samurai stands up and yells, "YOU FAIL THE TEST. THE CORRECT ANSWER IS 'KEN AND HIS FAITHFUL SQUID!'" He stamps a big "F" on your test.
You have failed the test, go back to the "meaning hint."
WaniKani_Reading_Info:
B. On the test, you fill in the "squid" bubble. Immediately after, Ken (けん) the samurai jumps up and yells, "YOU PASS THE TEST! YOU CHOSE SQUID, WHO IS KEN'S BEST FRIEND." He stamps a big "A" on your test.
You have passed the test. Proceed to learn more kanji.
Ru_Radicals: 人 (человек), 个 (китайский счётный суффикс), 口 (рот), 馬 (лошадь)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: we're unanimous (㑒) that the horse (馬) needs to be verified

験

Значения

Испытывать, проверять; действие, эффект

Мнемоника

  • Сокращение. Выводить коня 馬 на люди и совместно учинять ему полную проверку. Справа — человек 人, рот 口, а также треугольник — символ единства в значении собираться вместе и горланить, «сообща».

  • Прежде чем подняться на гору, человек проверяет лошадь 馬.

Варианты

驗, 验

Radicals: 馬  (horse, squid)
Meaning Mnemonic
"A horse or a squid?" That's the only question that is on your test.
This test is the most important test of your life, which is why it's confusing that there is only this one question: "horse or squid?"
If you choose "horse" jump to reading mnemonic "A."
If you choose "squid" jump to reading mnemonic "B."
Reading Mnemonic
A. On the test, you fill in the "horse" bubble. Immediately after, Ken (けん) the samurai stands up and yells, "YOU FAIL THE TEST. THE CORRECT ANSWER IS 'KEN AND HIS FAITHFUL SQUID!'" He stamps a big "F" on your test.
You have failed the test, go back to the "meaning hint."
B. On the test, you fill in the "squid" bubble. Immediately after, Ken (けん) the samurai jumps up and yells, "YOU PASS THE TEST! YOU CHOSE SQUID, WHO IS KEN'S BEST FRIEND." He stamps a big "A" on your test.
You have passed the test. Proceed to learn more kanji.
